name: Cinepardy rd1 - Movie Quiz
description:
50 Questions, 20sec a piece, see how many you can get right!

A project done for GameDev.tv's Unity 2D course, I had to work through a couple of bugs including a big timer issue and a button state issue, as frustrating as it was at the time, when I actually got it* it felt great. Coding scared me off a few years back but I think I'm slowly but surely starting to understand some of the logic.

Most of the questions are from The Movie Trivia Schmoedown, I help one of the competitors so I take notes on the matches, it’s a really fun YouTube channel if anyone wants to check it out and likes movie trivia!

WARNING: I turned off pausing when clicked off, no googling ;)
